section.title: Airport to Mora
section.note: Bus from Arlanda airport to Uppsala (30 min). Train to Gävle (45 min), then another train to Mora (3.5 h).
section.image: One of the rune stones next to the cathedral.
View from the university towards the cathedral.
House in Uppsala with real and fake windows.
A street near the center of Uppsala.
At the railway Station in Uppsala.
The X2000 train from Uppsala to Gävle.

section.title: Östersund to Gällivare
section.note: This was the longest trip by bus (11 h).
section.image: The well equipped bus to Gällivare.
A typical swedish house, properly colored.

section.title: Gällivare to Svolvær via Narvik
section.note: Train across the border to Narvik in Norway. Boat to Svolvær on the Lofoten islands.
section.image: One of the really tiny villages along the way.
At the highest point of the journey.
Iron ore transshipment facility in Narvik, the main reason for this town.
Yet another small village on the way.
Svolvær by night. Note all the activity.

section.title: Svolvær to Å
section.note: Bus to Å (5 h), a small village at the very end of the Lofoten islands.
section.image: Racks for drying fish, fortunately empty.
A lake on the way to Å.
The E10 route which crosses the entire Lofoten islands.
Some place in the middle of the island.
A village dwarfed by the mountains behind.
Two of the many bridges linking the islands.

section.title: Å to Bodø
section.note: The Ferry to Bodø doesn't leave till in the evening, so there's lots of time to go walking...
section.image: The ferry to Bodø in Moskenes, 5 km from Å.

section.title: Bodø to Trondheim
section.note: The longest trip by train (10 h).

section.title: Trondheim to Bergen
section.image: A monastery, later converted to a prison and then to a tourist attraction.
One of the main agricultural regions in Norway.
A fishing boat on its way home.
Kristiansund, a town on the way.
A mountain hiding in the clouds.

section.title: Bergen
section.note: The first and only place I have to use my umbrella...
section.image: View on the old part of Bergen.
Inside the old part of the town.

section.title: Bergen to Flåm
section.note: Along the "Norway in a Nutshell" route: Train to Voss (1 h), bus to Gudvangen (1 h) and finally a boat to Flåm (2 h).
section.image: The boat from Gudvangen to Flåm.
View on the Nærøyfjord from Gudvangen.
A boat heading in the opposite direction.
One of the larger waterfalls in the region.
One of the larger villages in the region.

section.title: Flåm to Oslo
section.note: Train to Myrdal (1 h), train to Oslo (5 h).
section.image: The road zig-zagging up to Myrdal.
Another waterfall, this time right next to the railway track.
A rainbow hiding behind a few leafless trees.
